channel.title: Rajat Dhiman on Biblical Dhiman
channel.description: Recent content in Rajat Dhiman on Biblical Dhiman

item.description:
About Rajat

Quick Bio

I am Rajat Dhiman, a born-again Christian from India. I run a Christian YouTube channel called â€œBiblical Dhimanâ€ to defend and answer questions raised against Christianity, God and the Bible.

When I was 16, I encountered the truth that God is not in the idol and salvation cannot be earned through works but is a free gift of God. I have experienced God’s presence. In addition, I have a conviction that God does exist.

Contact

You can reach out to Rajat Dhiman via the following methods:

  • Send an email at rddhiman10 at gmail dot com
  • Send a personal message on Twitter
  • Send a personal message on Instagram

à¤œà¤¬ à¤®à¥ˆà¤‚ 16 à¤¸à¤¾à¤² à¤•à¤¾ à¤¥à¤¾, à¤¤à¥‹ à¤®à¥à¤à¥‡ à¤‡à¤¸ à¤¸à¤šà¥à¤šà¤¾à¤ˆ à¤•à¤¾ à¤¸à¤¾à¤®à¤¨à¤¾ à¤•à¤°à¤¨à¤¾ à¤ªà¤¡à¤¼à¤¾ à¤•à¤¿ à¤ˆà¤¶à¥à¤µà¤° à¤®à¥‚à¤°à¥à¤¤à¤¿ à¤®à¥‡à¤‚ à¤¨à¤¹à¥€à¤‚ à¤¹à¥ˆ à¤”à¤° à¤®à¥‹à¤•à¥à¤· à¤•à¤°à¥à¤®à¥‹à¤‚ à¤•à¥‡ à¤®à¤¾à¤§à¥à¤¯à¤® à¤¸à¥‡ à¤…à¤°à¥à¤œà¤¿à¤¤ à¤¨à¤¹à¥€à¤‚ à¤•à¤¿à¤¯à¤¾ à¤œà¤¾ à¤¸à¤•à¤¤à¤¾ à¤¹à¥ˆ, à¤¬à¤²à¥à¤•à¤¿ à¤¯à¤¹ à¤ˆà¤¶à¥à¤µà¤° à¤•à¤¾ à¤à¤• à¤®à¥à¤«à¤¼à¥à¤¤ à¤‰à¤ªà¤¹à¤¾à¤° à¤¹à¥ˆà¥¤ à¤®à¥ˆà¤‚à¤¨à¥‡ à¤ˆà¤¶à¥à¤µà¤° à¤•à¥€ à¤‰à¤ªà¤¸à¥à¤¥à¤¿à¤¤à¤¿ à¤•à¤¾ à¤…à¤¨à¥à¤­à¤µ à¤•à¤¿à¤¯à¤¾ à¤¹à¥ˆà¥¤ à¤‡à¤¸à¤•à¥‡ à¤…à¤²à¤¾à¤µà¤¾, à¤®à¥à¤à¥‡ à¤µà¤¿à¤¶à¥à¤µà¤¾à¤¸ à¤¹à¥ˆ à¤•à¤¿ à¤ˆà¤¶à¥à¤µà¤° à¤®à¥Œà¤œà¥‚à¤¦ à¤¹à¥ˆà¥¤

Rajat’s Podcasts

Biblical Dhiman Podcasts

1. Jesus Spoke In The Hindu Temple | Rahil Patel

  • Date: February 28, 2023
  • Duration: 34 minutes
  • Summary: Rahil Patel, an ex-Hindu priest, shares his journey of encountering Jesus Christ and becoming a follower of Jesus.
  • Apple Podcasts: Listen
  • Spotify: Listen

2. Does The Bible Complement Theistic Evolution? with Ken Ham

  • Date: February 1, 2023
  • Duration: 40 minutes
  • Summary: Ken Ham, Founder of Answers in Genesis, discusses the compatibility of the Bible with Theistic Evolution.
  • Apple Podcasts: Listen
  • Spotify: Listen

3. How Can Jesus Be Fully God & Fully Man? with Dr. Stephen Wellum

  • Date: August 19, 2023
  • Duration: 40 minutes
  • Summary: Dr. Stephen Wellum, Pastor and Professor of Christian Theology, explores the doctrine of the person of Christ.
  • Apple Podcasts: Listen
  • Spotify: Listen

4. Additional Episodes

  • Summary: Explore more episodes on Biblical Dhiman’s podcast series on platforms like Apple Podcasts and Spotify.

Feel free to check out the full list of episodes on platforms like Apple Podcasts and Spotify!

item.title: About Rajat
item.description:
Quick Bio

I am Rajat Dhiman, a born-again Christian from India. I run a Christian YouTube channel called â€œBiblical Dhimanâ€ to defend and answer questions raised against Christianity, God and the Bible.

When I was 16, I encountered the truth that God is not in the idol and salvation cannot be earned through works but is a free gift of God. I have experienced God’s presence. In addition, I have a conviction that God does exist.

item.title: Resources
item.description:
Recommended Books

Mere Christianity by C.S. Lewis

A classic exploration of the Christian faith, addressing core beliefs and tackling difficult questions.

The Case for Christ by Lee Strobel

An investigative journalist examines the historical evidence for Jesus, offering a compelling case for Christianity.

Radical: Taking Back Your Faith from the American Dream by David Platt

A call to Christians to live a radical, sacrificial life in following Jesus.

The Purpose Driven Life: What on Earth Am I Here For? by Rick Warren

A best-selling book that explores God’s purpose for our lives and how to live a life of significance.
